name: Thematic Product Roadmap
description:
A theme-based product roadmap template. Remember, a roadmap is not a promise, this should be a living part of your product strategy. Keep your themes high level, and if you absolutely must use timelines, keep your timelines ordinal, not time-specific.


This is a great way to visualize any amount of work. Start high level, and circle in on your details. This template can also be refactored to break down your work tactically. I would recommend keeping it high level here, and getting more detailed in your backlog once you have your milestones identified.


We focus on themes and goals because our Why and your Whats must be aligned before we can discuss How we will solve the problem(s).


Have fun!
